en.title: FusionExcel Sponsors RM 20,000 To The Women's Football Association Of Malaysia!
en.content: FusionExcel is proud to sponsor RM 20,000 ( Cash and Quantum Science Products) to the Women's Football Association of Malaysia.  At FusionExcel's Achievers Recognition Dinner at PGRM on the 08th August 2009, FusionExcel's Founder CEO Paul Ting and Founder Director KS Lee presented a mock cheque to Team Manager YM Tunku Ellie Badariah and Head Coach Ms Zhang Hong.

meta.description: FusionExcel is proud to sponsor RM 20,000( Cash and Quantum Science Products) to the Women's Football Association of Malaysia.
meta.keyword: FusionExcel, Women's Football Association Of Malaysia.
meta.author: klhunter
